name: Batch Compressed Massive Scordite
description: Massive Scordite was the stuff of legend in the early days of space exploration, due to a 10% higher mineral yield than standard scordite. Though it has long since been taken over in value by other ores it still has a special place in the hearts of veteran miners. Scordite is amongst the most common ore types in the central regions of known universe. It has a fair bit of Tritanium and Pyerite. Good choice for those starting their mining careers. This material was compressed using an older process that compressed batches of raw materials into units using a set input quantity. Newer compression technology uses a more flexible one-to-one unit compression system.
